title: BONUS: NBA Deputy Commissioner Mark Tatum + New York State Senator Kevin Parker
itunes:author: Ebro In The Morning on HOT 97
itunes:summary:
Ebro in the Morning sits down with NBA Deputy Commissioner Mark Tatum to discuss the 2022 NBA Playoffs, and other topics surrounding the league including fixing the dunk contest, supporting the WNBA, social justice, tv ratings, 75 Greatest NBA Players and more! 

Ebro in the Morning sits down with New York State Senator Kevin Parker to discuss some of the biggest issues in the state including ghost guns, safety across the state, dealing with Homelessness, and much more. 

 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
